name: Lego The Incredibles
summary: Lego The Incredibles is a Lego-themed action-adventure video game developed by TT Fusion, based on both The Incredibles and Incredibles 2 films. The game was released by Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment on 15 June 2018 in North America and on 13 July 2018 in Europe.
info:
• 中文名: 乐高超人总动员
  • 开发: TT Games
  • 发行: Warner Bros. Interactive Entertainment
  • 别名: LEGO® The Incredibles
  • 平台: PC
  • 平台: Switch
  • 平台: PS4
  • 平台: Xbox One
  • 游戏类型: AAVG
  • 游玩人数: 单人，多人
  • 发行日期: 2018年6月15日
